content:
Morgan Gleason, 21, wins DevDays Patient Innovator Track (with video of her winning talk, and link to the Zulip conversation she spawned)

We're publishing these because we want to get started early (aka now) on publicizing for entries for this fall's edition. Spread the word to all interested in patient empowerment through health data and FHIR!
Thanks for sharing this @Dave deBronkart . Impressive presentation @Morgan Gleason -- well done!
Hey Morgan - that's from last year's winner!
